TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Typeof extends Microsoft.JScript.UnaryOp

Docs.summary: Determines the data types of objects. This class belongs to the abstract syntax tree category.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string JScriptTypeof(object value) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to determine the type of.
Docs.summary: Determines the data type of the specified object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The return value can be one of the following string literals:
- boolean
- date
- function
- number
- object
- string
- undefined
- unknown
